Class GameScreen<T extends Game>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.badlogic.gdx.ScreenAdapter
      • be.ac.umons.gui.GameScreen<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - Game to be shown/played
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.badlogic.gdx.Screen
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AutomaticGameScreen, BasicGameScreen, EditorScreen

    public abstract class GameScreen<T extends Game>
extends com.badlogic.gdx.ScreenAdapter
    Screen model used to show/play a game
